page.title: 13Shopping.
page.content:
As there is only one small shop in the area most people shop in the nearby towns.A survey was taken to find out shopping habits. Eighty people responded to the following question:- "In which town do you usually do your household shopping?"
3 people shop regularly in Stratford. 7 people shop regularly in Warwick. 67 people shop regularly in Leamington 3 show wherever they happen to be. This was not surprise as the popular supermarkets are in Leamington Spa. Sainsbury's and Asda have large stores with easy car parking in the town. All the people in the survey travel by car to do their shopping. Startford upon Avon has problems with tourist traffic throughout the year. Warwick does not have a large store and parking is limited.
